properties.areaDesc: Clinton, PA; Union, PA; Clearfield, PA; Centre, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 7:41AM EST until January 8 at 8:15AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Southeastern Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania...
Central Centre County in central Pennsylvania...
West central Union County in central Pennsylvania...
Southeastern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania...

* Until 815 AM EST.

* At 741 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from Lamar to near Woodland, moving southeast at 25 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts up to 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the
Woodland and Jersey Shore exits, specifically from mile markers 128
to 187.

This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 79 to 85.

Locations impacted include...
Bellefonte, Mifflinburg, Woodward, Pleasant Gap, Philipsburg, Lamar,
Zion, Osceola Mills, Milesburg, Millheim, Chester Hill, Snow Shoe,
Blanchard, North Philipsburg, Clarence, Aaronsburg, Rebersburg, South
Philipsburg, Madisonburg and Julian.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

If traveling on a highway, find the nearest exit or rest area and
park safely away from traffic. Allow snow squalls to pass before
attempting to resume travel.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 8:15 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
